import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Slidebar.css' import {Avatar,IconButton} from '@mui/material' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {DonutLarge,Chat,MoreVert, SearchOutlined} from '@mui/icons-material' import SildebarChat from '../components/sildebarChat/SildebarChat' import axios from 'axios' import { msgSuccess } from '../slices/msgSlice' export default function Slidebar() { const {user} = useSelector(state=>state.authState) const {msg=([])} = useSelector(state=>state.msgState) const dispatch = useDispatch() // const [rooms,setRooms] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/v1/all/rooms').then((response)=>{ dispatch(msgSuccess(response.data.data)) }) },[msg]) return (
{msg.map((room)=>( ))}
) }
